CustomField.description: Property funding probability, based on Property Status.
CustomField.formula: CASE(Status__c, "Due Diligence", "Possible", "Pending", "Probable", "Closing", "High Certainty", "On Hold", "Outlook Uncertain", "Cancelled", "Won't Fund", "Inactive", "Won't Fund", "Rescinded", "Won't Fund", "Funded" )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: How likely a property is to fund.
CustomField.label: Funding Probability
